name: Testovací program
description: První testovací program na otestování funkčnosti.

name: Zápočtový projekt
definition:
Spec = acc.'del.Spec

Impl1 = (Sender | Receiver | Med1 | Timer) \ {snd0mes, snd0acc, snd1mes, snd1acc, rec0mes, rec0acc, rec1mes, rec1acc, timer}
Impl2 = (Sender | Receiver | Med2 | Timer) \ {snd0mes, snd0acc, snd1mes, snd1acc, rec0mes, rec0acc, rec1mes, rec1acc, timer}
Impl3 = (Sender | Receiver | Med3 | Timer) \ {snd0mes, snd0acc, snd1mes, snd1acc, rec0mes, rec0acc, rec1mes, rec1acc, timer}

Timer = 'timer.Timer

Sender  = acc.'snd0mes.SenderWait0
Sender1 = acc.'snd1mes.SenderWait1
SenderWait0 = rec0acc.Sender1 + rec1acc.'snd0mes.SenderWait0 + timer.('snd0mes.SenderWait0 + SenderWait0)
SenderWait1 = rec1acc.Sender  + rec0acc.'snd1mes.SenderWait1 + timer.('snd1mes.SenderWait1 + SenderWait1)

Receiver  = rec0mes.'del.'snd0acc.Receiver1 + rec1mes.'snd1acc.Receiver
Receiver1 = rec1mes.'del.'snd1acc.Receiver  + rec0mes.'snd0acc.Receiver1

Med1 = Med1Mes | Med1Acc
Med1Mes = snd0mes.'rec0mes.Med1Mes + snd1mes.'rec1mes.Med1Mes
Med1Acc = snd0acc.'rec0acc.Med1Acc + snd1acc.'rec1acc.Med1Acc

Med2 = Med2Mes | Med2Acc
Med2Mes = snd0mes.('rec0mes.Med2Mes + Med2Mes) + snd1mes.('rec1mes.Med2Mes + Med2Mes)
Med2Acc = snd0acc.('rec0acc.Med2Acc + Med2Acc) + snd1acc.('rec1acc.Med2Acc + Med2Acc)

Med3 = Med3Mes | Med3Acc
Med3Mes = snd0mes.Med3Mes0 + snd1mes.Med3Mes1
Med3Acc = snd0acc.Med3Acc0 + snd1acc.Med3Acc1
Med3Mes0 = 'rec0mes.Med3Mes0 + Med3Mes
Med3Mes1 = 'rec1mes.Med3Mes1 + Med3Mes
Med3Acc0 = 'rec0acc.Med3Acc0 + Med3Acc
Med3Acc1 = 'rec1acc.Med3Acc1 + Med3Acc

name: Nekonečný cyklus
definition:
A = a.A
B = a.b.B
C = a.C | C
